Class StockPurchase

java.lang.Object
  StockPurchase

public class StockPurchase
extends java.lang.Object

Class describing the information (fields) and behaviour (methods) needed to buy a certain quantity of a specific stock

Version:
v1.0 Nov 1, 2016
Author:
Vinay Punwani

Method Summary
 void displayStockDetails()
          Method displayStockDetails which displays the stock info (symbol and price), as well as the total cost of buying the number of shares defined
 int getNumberOfShares()
          Method getNumberOfShares which returns the number of shares that will be purchased at a specific share price
 Stock getStock()
          Method getStock which returns a Stock object
 double getTotalCost()
          Method getTotalCost which calculates and returns the total cost of purchasing a specific number of shares of a particular stock

          Method setNumberOfShares which validates and sets the number of shares to be purchased of a stock at the specific share price

          Method setStock which validates a Stock object parameter and sets the value of the stock field, or instantiates a new Stock object and assigns it to the stock field.

Method Detail

displayStockDetails

public void displayStockDetails()
Method displayStockDetails which displays the stock info (symbol and price), as well as the total cost of buying the number of shares defined

getNumberOfShares

public int getNumberOfShares()
Method getNumberOfShares which returns the number of shares that will be purchased at a specific share price

Returns:
The return value is the number of shares that will be purchased

getStock

public Stock getStock()
Method getStock which returns a Stock object

Returns:
The return value of the stock object

getTotalCost

public double getTotalCost()
Method getTotalCost which calculates and returns the total cost of purchasing a specific number of shares of a particular stock

Returns:
The return value is the total cost of buying the stock shares

Method setNumberOfShares which validates and sets the number of shares to be purchased of a stock at the specific share price

Parameters:
numberOfShares - A parameter containing the number of shares to be purchased of a stock

setStock

public void setStock(Stock stock)
Method setStock which validates a Stock object parameter and sets the value of the stock field, or instantiates a new Stock object and assigns it to the stock field.

Parameters:
